Item.Description: A fresh green apple. It is a bit sour, but maybe you're into that.
Item.Name: Green Apple

Item.Description: A red apple fresh from the farm.
Item.Name: Red apple

Item.Description: If you're trying to find an apple they don't flavor candy after, look no further than this juicy yellow apple.
Item.Name: Yellow Apple

Item.Description: Bananas typically grow in tropical, non-lunar environments.
Item.Name: Banana

Item.Description: A crisp carrot. Good for eyesight and motivation.
Item.Name: Carrot

Item.Description: A crisp stalk of celery. Grown in the sunshine.
Item.Name: Celery Stalk

Item.Description: A fresh baked cookie with chocolate chips. (Warning: Highly addictive.)
Item.Name: Cookie

Item.Description: A cupcake with a cherry on top.
Item.Name: Cupcake

Item.Description: A juicy fresh pear. Because apparently apples aren't good enough for you.
Item.Name: Pear

Item.Description: A musical flute. The more you play, the more you know how to play the flute.
Item.Name: Flute

Item.Description: A shiny new saxophone with which to make the music.
Item.Name: Saxophone

Item.Description: A trombone. If anypony falls down, you'll be prepared to cruelly mock their suffering!
Item.Name: Trombone

Item.Description: A trumpet. Good for concerts, dance halls, and impromptu days of judgement.
Item.Name: Trumpet

Item.Description: A wonderful violin with steel strings.
Item.Name: Violin

Item.Description: A chunk of ore. I wonder what it could be?
Item.Name: Chunk of Ore

Item.Description: Ponies are not capable of learning through osmosis, although that doesn't mean you can't try.
Item.Name: Book Hat

Item.Description: These goggles will protect your eyes from flies while you're in the skies!
Item.Name: Goggles

Item.Description: For horses with poor vision, or those who just like the fashion, look no further than this trusty pair of eyeglasses!
Item.Name: Glasses

Item.Description: Made from worn faux leather.
Item.Name: Cowpony Hat

Item.Description: Can also be used to carry juice, but be careful where you store it.
Item.Name: Potion Bags

Item.Description: Perfect for preventing chemical burns, It also helps give you an intelligent aura.
Item.Name: Lab Coat

Item.Description: You've gotta keep your hoofsies warm somehow.
Item.Name: Boots

Item.Description: Legends has it that whoever's hooves can fit into these boots will look fabulous for the gala.
Item.Name: Gala boots

Item.Description: A useful tool for chipping away at rocks and the occasional mineral.
Item.Name: Pickaxe

Item.Description: To attempt to list every use of the hammer would be folly, for it is among the most versatile of tools.
Item.Name: Hammer

Item.Description: A juicy strawberry filled with strawberry juice.
Item.Name: Strawberry

Item.Description: An exqusite example of a strawberry dessert!
Item.Name: Strawberry Torte

Item.Description: A crate of potions used for medicine.
Item.Name: Medical Potion Crate

Item.Description: Such fancy materials!
Item.Name: Stack of Cloth

Item.Description: Feeling hungry? Once you open this you can eat to your heart's content.
Item.Name: Food Box

Item.Description: A cap that shows you are an assitant nurse. (Although it is best to stay out of medical matters until you've had the proper training.)
Item.Name: Assistant Nurse Cap

Item.Description: A mysterious multi-coloured liquid.
Item.Name: Rainbow Essence

Item.Description: Nothing is getting through that. But just to be safe, don't try it.
Item.Name: Hard Hat

Item.Description: A potion that restores your health.
Item.Name: Health Potion

Item.Description: A wooden spoon, perfect for mixing things!
Item.Name: Mixing Spoon

Item.Description: Fire, on a stick! It's useful for providing light and also for lighting things that are hard to reach.
Item.Name: Torch

Item.Description: A water container. It also can make a cool helmet. But it's better as a water container.
Item.Name: Water Bucket

Item.Description: A water container. It also can make a cool helmet. But it's better as a water container. This one has water in it!
Item.Name: Water Bucket (Full)

Item.Description: A frozen drop of cloud essence. It could be useful to somepony.
Item.Name: Frozen Essence Drops

Item.Description: Zut alors! It's all for one, and one for fancy with this iconic piece of headwear.
Item.Name: Musketeer Hat

Item.Description: An egg, freshly laid and collected this morning. Don't put too many of these in one saddlebag.
Item.Name: Egg

Item.Description: The book Skyhammer gave me to return to Final Ink at the Canterlot Library.
Item.Name: Skyhammer's Book

Item.Description: A fine pastry topped with a mountain of whipped cream. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Whipped Cream Pie

Item.Description: A freshly baked apple pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Apple Pie

Item.Description: A gooseberry pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Gooseberry Pie

Item.Description: A fabulous fusion of toffee, pie, and bananas. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Banoffee Pie

Item.Description: A nice strawberry pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Strawberry Pie

Item.Description: A pie freshly made with raspberries. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Raspberry Pie

Item.Description: A fresh cherry pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Cherry Pie

Item.Description: A pie made with a blueberry filling. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Blueberry Pie

Item.Description: Hmm, an empty pie tin. This could fit on your head...
Item.Name: Empty Pie Tin

Item.Description: General Messerchmitt's script. It's full of jargon and words that are long and weird. It says "rhododendron" at one point. No joke.
Item.Name: General Messerschmitt's Speech

Item.Description: Ambitious ponies can earn one of these by sitting quietly through the esteemed general's lengthy war tales.
Item.Name: Messerchmitt's Letter of Recommendation

Item.Description: Adjustable leg barding, clearly pegasusian in design.
Item.Name: Bronze Back Legs

Item.Description: A finely crafted Cloudsdale champron.
Item.Name: Bronze Helmet

Item.Description: A durable peytral emblazoned with the emblem of a Cloudsdale craftspony.
Item.Name: Bronze Chest Plate

Item.Description: Designed for long stretches of wear. One size fits all.
Item.Name: Bronze Front Legs

Item.Description: For those who enjoy science but prefer not to be blind.
Item.Name: Lab Goggles

Item.Description: Bag full of scrolls.
Item.Name: Scroll Bag

Item.Description: Just think of all the things you can hold!
Item.Name: Satchel Bag

Item.Description: Dont hit things too hard with this, or you might break it.
Item.Name: Wooden Sword

Item.Description: How did you get this hat? Give it back to Ellowee this instant!
Item.Name: Ellowee's Hat

Item.Description: Careful where you wear this. You might mess up someone's perfect lawn.
Item.Name: Dandelion Bracelet

Item.Description: A freshly picked dandelion. It looks pretty.
Item.Name: Dandelion

Item.Description: Thbbbpt
Item.Name: Fluffle Puff

Item.Description: *fluffly noises*
Item.Name: Fluffle Hat

Item.Description: Watch your back!
Item.Name: Bronze Back Plate

Item.Description: Some tasty mushrooms. YUM!
Item.Name: Mushrooms

Item.Description: A flower from high up in the mountains of Cantermore.
Item.Name: Mountain Flower

Item.Description: This rock is the best rock. Look at how smooth it is.
Item.Name: Smooth Rock

Item.Description: A beautiful shiny ruby. A pretty common gem in Equestria, often marketed as Dragon Feed.
Item.Name: Ruby

Item.Description: Dust made from rubies. Sometimes employed for medical purposes.
Item.Name: Ruby Dust

Item.Description: Perfect for a rainy day. This item can only be worn by itself. You cannot wear any other items with this item for now. Sorry for the inconvenience!
Item.Name: Raincloud Hat

Item.Description: A pretty heavy package..
Item.Name: Big Package

Item.Description: The Paso Fino Perfect Party Pastry Pack is the perfect pack for pacifying potentially perturbant party ponies. Purportedly.
Item.Name: Paso Fino Basket

Item.Description: Clouddate: August 12. It was a day like any other. The birds were singing. The sun was shining. All seemed well in the world... Until disaster struck! Bjaaaaw, pew pew! Those are the sounds the disaster made whilst striking! It was up to me to save the day! I asked my trusty sidekick, Fire Opal, if she could help me get my cape out of the door. She openly refused on what appeared to be moral grounds, given the ferocity with which she declared herself to be napping, perhaps in recognition of some religious sabbatical. Her sensibilities are still a mystery to me. Perhaps I should inquire about this later, when there are no more disasters.
Item.Name: Cirrus's Diary

Item.Description: The professor sipped gingerly at her ginger tea as she contemplated this new development. Perhaps it was he, and not she, who should be paying for the sheep insurance. After all, if what Pepper had said proved true, it was his idea to begin with that the insurance ought to be purchased at all, and her buyer's remorse was no great secret. After contemplating over this for a small while, she concluded that she would allow her dear coltfriend to take the fall for the whole incident, and smugly began writing a letter to notify the alien biker squid mafia of this new information.
Item.Name: Scribble's Novel

Item.Description: Perfect pitch pony phones.
Item.Name: Hullabaloo's Headphones

Item.Description: A small device used to record conversations without being detected.
Item.Name: Bugsy's Bug

Item.Description: If rabbits don't lay eggs, then explain to me why they would need to hide them. You can't.
Item.Name: Rabbit Egg

Item.Description: This is a dog egg that exists for long and boring reasons involving magic and elemets. If you're that interested, check your local library. The fine people there might have an answer.
Item.Name: Dog Egg

Item.Description: One of the three missing pieces of the Aperit Amphora, now no longer missing.
Item.Name: Amphora Base

Item.Description: One of the three missing pieces of the Aperit Amphora, now no longer missing.
Item.Name: Amphora Statuette

Item.Description: One of the three missing pieces of the Aperit Amphora, now no longer missing.
Item.Name: Amphora Grip

Item.Description: Rosemary has entrusted you with this book's return to Final Ink.
Item.Name: Without Any Seam or Needlework

Item.Description: Amazing technology that lets you see in the dark
Item.Name: Lantern

Item.Description: The stylish way to keep your hoofsies warm.
Item.Name: Socks

Item.Description: Mercury asked me to deliver these to Swift and Olga.
Item.Name: Medical Supplies

Item.Description: It fillets, it sautes, it boils, it broils, it doesn't do any of that, it fries!
Item.Name: Frying Pan

Item.Description: Pyrite gave you this package while day-dreaming about an ancient world. Ostensibly contains Midnight's violin.
Item.Name: Pyrite's Package

Item.Description: Actually containing a violin, this package should be in Midnight's hooves.
Item.Name: Midnight's Package

Item.Description: You can do anything if you believe
Item.Name: Cat Egg

Item.Description: An advance copy of Purple Rains melodramatic auto biography.
Item.Name: "Sand to Stardom" Prerelease Copy

Item.Description: The first book in Foreshadows new avant-garde urban fantasy series. She swears itll be a thousand-bit collectors item once she gets famous, and advises you to hold onto it. It might make a nice hat (but thatd probably ruin the collectors value).
Item.Name: Catalepsy, Signed 1st Edition

Item.Description: The secret ingredient is rocks.
Item.Name: Rock Candy

Item.Description: I have to deliver this pie to Granny Grey.
Item.Name: Granny Grey's Apple Pie

Item.Description: I have to deliver this pie to Farmer Fields and figure out how much I'm getting paid to do this.
Item.Name: Farmer Fields' Gooseberry Pie

Item.Description: I wish I could sell this.
Item.Name: Gomi's Cherry Pie

Item.Description: Whipped cream pies are meant to be thrown at clowns, not eaten.
Item.Name: Buck's Whipped Cream Pie

Item.Description: Sextant needs this telescope so he can make scientific progress.
Item.Name: Looking Glass

Item.Name: Scribble's Paper

Item.Description: Its a little crumpled up and sticky, but its still mostly legible. It must have gotten wedged in a corner of your saddlebags under your stuff.

Item.Name: Arrest Warrant

Item.Description: An exotic mineral which can be used to slow down or speed up the growth of crystals. Potentially dangerous. If you are a crystal pony, or think you might become a crystal pony, extreme caution should be used in handling and usage.
Item.Name: Stopping Salt

Item.Description: Valuable gems, mined from beneath the Crystal Kingdom, refined in Griffonia, and sold throughout Equestria.
Item.Name: Gems

Item.Description: The origin of many idioms.
Item.Name: Hornet's Nest
